resources.string:
We appreciate that you trust us with information that is important to you.
 Our Privacy Policy is fully compliant with the latest laws and regulations.
 
 The information that our application will collect is as follows and we take every precaution to keep it safe.
 
Gender
Date of birth
Height Weight
Number of step
Duration of sleep
Pulse (if available)
 
Analytics data may be collected but is not linked to your identity
 
Please read the details of Privacy Policy and confirm your agreement.
 
NOTE: We DO NOT use any data or information collected for tracking purposes.
 
Security Reminder: Keep your smartphone locked to secure your activity and health data when you are away from your smart phone

string.name: permission
string.h4: This App requires the following permissions:

resources.string:
Read Contacts Permission\n
This is used to set favorite contacts. IMPORTANT This App may upload contact list to your smart device accordi to your instructions.
Storage Permission\n This is used to read, save and share images, system files, etc. IMPORTANT: This App may upload some images to your smart device according to your instructions.
SMS Permission\n This is used to display SMS on your smart device. IMPORTANT: This App may upload SMS to your smart device according to your instructions
Location permission\n This is used for GPS sports, Bluetooth device pairing, and local weather forecast
Notifications permission\n This is used to display notifications on your smart device. IMPORTANT: This App may upload notifications to your smart device according to your instructions.
Camera permission\n This is used for your smart device to control the camera shutter of your smartphone.
Answer Phone Calls Permission\n This is used for Bluetooth pairing and connection with your smart device, incoming call notifications, etc
Call Log Permission\n This is used to display recent call log on your smart device
TouchApp is specially designed for all models:\n On your smart watch, you may go to Settings-Sysrtems to find your smart watch model.
Permission denied, cannot check Bluetooth status
